metadata.name: Php Inline Command Execution
metadata.comment: Detects execution of php using the "-r" flag. This is could be used as a way to launch a reverse shell or execute live php code.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\php.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('php.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -r')))

output.summary: Detects execution of php using the "-r" flag. This is could be used as a way to launch a reverse shell or execute live php code.
